page.title: 20Cwmbran's Flower Gardens
page.content:
Great importance has been attached by Cwmbran Development Corporation to landscaping and many acres of grass, thousands of trees, shrubs and hedges give Cwmbran a pleasant garden environment. One of their major projects was to turn disused clay pits at Oakfield into pleasant flower gardens. Most adults use the flower gardens for walking around or for admiring the view. Children go there to meet friends or to take a short cut to avoid a dangerous road. About half the people go to study the plants and fish that are to be found there. Some go to read or have a picnic, while others walk their dogs.
Written after a survey by: Angie, Victoria and Emma (Oakfield)
